meanings.definition: A small molding used in architecture.
meanings.sent1: The reglet added a decorative touch to the top of the building.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter carefully installed the reglet along the edge of the ceiling.
meanings.sent3: The reglet decided to throw a party for all the other moldings in the house.
meanings.sent4: The reglet stood out among the plain walls like a crown on a king.
meanings.sent5: The intricate design of the reglet made it stand out in everyone's memory.

meanings.definition: A strip of wood or metal used in printing.
meanings.sent1: The printer inserted the reglet to create space between the lines of text.
meanings.sent2: The reglet was essential for maintaining the alignment of the letters on the press.
meanings.sent3: The reglet challenged the ink roller to a race around the printing press.
meanings.sent4: The reglet acted as a silent conductor, guiding each letter into its place.
meanings.sent5: The reglet's role in printing was as crucial as a bridge connecting words together.

meanings.sent1: Water flowed smoothly through the reglet carved into the stone.
meanings.sent2: The reglet in the gutter prevented rainwater from overflowing.
meanings.sent3: The reglet giggled as it directed raindrops down the drain.
meanings.sent4: The reglet served as a secret passage for tiny ants to navigate the wall.
meanings.sent5: The reglet's purpose was as clear as a path through a dense forest.
